lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I love the stories.
lender.occupational_info: I co-founded a startup nonprofit (this one!) and I work with an amazing group of people dreaming up ways to alleviate poverty through personal lending.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Life is about connecting with each other.

lender.name: Skylar
lender.loan_because: I believe empowering local entrepreneurs to develop their communities will eradicate many of the injustices and evils in our world. It works to level the socio-economic barriers between us, and return us to the relationship which we were created to be in with one another - equal.

lender.name: Mike & Carol
lender.loan_because: We are amazed by the opportunities we get to connect with people through kiva. We are huge fans of the organization and the staff!
lender.occupational_info: I was first a Navy pilot and then I ran a company that manufactured lumber and paper. Carol was a nurse and a wonderful mother.

lender.name: Ryan Pressler
lender.loan_because: I understand the importance of bringing an idea to fruition in order to better one's family, self, and community. I feel that primitive ideas such as agriculture are most important. When the mind and body is nourished our creativity can flourish!
lender.occupational_info: I design interactive things on tv screens that allow you to access informative and entertaining content.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: Our daughter Jessica Jackley (founder of Kiva.org) and our son Adam (teaching pastor) have shown us what it means to think and feel with your heart. I want to be able to make a difference in peoples lives just as my children have done. We have so much and so many have so little. I am blessed to have wonderful role models to watch as they both change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach first grade (6-7 year olds) and believe in lifelong learning. I believe in my children and their dreams!

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to help people stand on their own feet and be proud of what they can do, so they can help others
lender.occupational_info: connect people with ideas that can improve life

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I think it is important for each of us to do what we can to help each other along.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who helps people and companies develop and protect their inventions.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: all small businesses need access to capital.

lender.name: Ryan & Brooke
lender.loan_because: We love Kiva and all that it does. We love having our family connected to the world in this way.
lender.occupational_info: Ryan builds houses and Brooke keeps our house running

lender.name: Jeevan
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small computers and make them do nice stuff for people, if all goes well.

lender.name: Peter and Jane Carpenter
lender.loan_because: We are committed to helping others realize their full potential through innovation and hard work by adding our capital to their dreams.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference.

lender.name: Katie and Tyler
lender.loan_because:
We believe that "to whom much is given, much is expected." God has given us extraordinary blessings so we give on to others.
Kiva.org is an opportunity to really connect with people who have completely different lives than ours. It is amazing to be a part of this incredible vision!
lender.occupational_info: Katie works for her family's business selling plumbing repair parts in Seattle. Tyler works for Advaiya, a consulting company in Redmond, Washington.

lender.name: Premal
lender.loan_because: there is no them.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help build Kiva's team and improve its service. I absolutely love working at Kiva because of the potential of this idea and the great people it has attracted along the way.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: These are people who have decided to take their destiny in their own hands... they're not sitting around waiting for things to be given to them.
lender.occupational_info: I run an organization that gets people involved in their communities, because I believe that one person can make a real difference both in their own society, and in the broader world.

lender.name: daveschappell
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to improve their own lives
lender.occupational_info: I help people find great local teachers and schools, so they can learn new skills

lender.name: Adam + Katie
lender.loan_because: We loan as an active expression of our faith in God and belief in every entrepreneur in whom we invest.
lender.occupational_info: Katie does orthopedic surgery and Adam reads and writes about theology.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: To offset my white middle class guilt
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer screen and pretend to interact with the world.

lender.name: M,S,J, and T Schnuck
lender.occupation: Business Analyst, Student, Online Marketing Guys
lender.loan_because:
We loan because Kiva provides the lender with an incredible and unique opportunity to learn about, support, and connect with world-changing entrepreneurs.

Kiva co-founder Jessica Jackley Flannery is one of my great friends and favorite people. Like her organization, Jessica is incredible and unique and she inspires everyone who is lucky enough to meet or know her. You can\'t help but want to be involved in everything she does.

In addition, my sweet new husband and brothers-in-law are so cool, progressive and all-around amazing men that they agreed to support Kiva in lue of Christmas presents.
lender.occupational_info:
Matt and Tommy build websites on a variety of topics (their websites are similar to magazines).
Jason works for a grocery store and figures out how to buy products at a rate that brings savings to the consumer.
I (Shannon) am in school to learn how to work with students who are having trouble learning.
As a group we enjoy St. Louis baseball, golf, watching ESPN, yoga, and milk.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I traveled to Cambodia in the summer of 2006. I was able to see many lives changed for the better because of Kiva loans.
lender.occupational_info: I teach seventh grade history in Northern California.

lender.name: Pontus
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is the most effective form of development support I know of.
lender.occupational_info: Am currently studying business at the graduate level.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: I teach my children.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Money can do a lot of good -- especially in the hands of hard working people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach global history and civics at a Manhattan public high school. My students are 14 and 15 years old.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I choose to speak in terms of microcredit.
lender.occupational_info: I make movies.

lender.name: dennis
lender.loan_because:
I love to see more compassion in the world of finance and lending.
Everyone deserves a fair chance to get ahead under conditions they can make a life with.
lender.occupational_info: Creating computer programs that show pictures and movies and songs

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: Every entrepreneur deserves a fair chance.
lender.occupational_info: Fulbright Scholar in Romania

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I know that even these small loans can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company like Kiva that lets Americans lend to other Americans.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: it's fun

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: Are you kidding me? Kiva is the coolest thing ever.
lender.occupational_info: My job is just like microfinance, only with a lot more paperwork.

lender.name: Tobias Buckell

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I believe in you!

lender.name: Kenneth and Evelyn

lender.name: Subbarao
lender.loan_because: it is inspiring and humbling to see hardworking families strive and rise out of harsh \'man-made\' circumstances. \\\\r\\\\n
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office with computers and assist \'big\' businesses handle their day-to-day affairs - translation: software systems designer. \\\\r\\\\n

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. How can I ever expect the world to change if I'm not doing anything to change it? Kiva offers a chance for individuals to help themselves - everyone should have that opportunity so I'm happy to support an organization which recognizes that.

lender.name: Dan & Gin
lender.loan_because: "When a poor person dies of hunger, it has not happened because God did not take care of him or her. It has happened because neither you nor I wanted to give that person what he or she needed." - Mother Teresa

lender.name: Stephen Dann
lender.loan_because: small changes made by individuals pool together to make major changes in society
lender.occupational_info: I spend my time looking at ways to adapt commercial business activity to change the world into a better place.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: We should all do what we can.
lender.occupational_info: I\'m staring a new charity to support youth in working together to create positive global change.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I love entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: I write books and train entrepreneurs worldwide

lender.name: Prew Family
lender.loan_because: so when my girls are grown up, hopefully the world will be a slightly better place.

lender.name: Kaitlin
lender.occupational_info: Public policy research.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Going directly to where people are in need cuts down on the chance that funds will go astray, and helps give people confidence and a sense of control over their lives. If we are one big family, we should act like it and equip those who have little, so they can become much!
lender.occupational_info: During the day I am helping build the Course Development Studio and Billion Kids Library for Open Learning Exchange, www.ole.org. In my own time I write plays.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: what a cool opportunity! How could anyone pass this up?!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother--super important job. I'm also an artist and I do this part-time now when time is available.

lender.name: Patsy
lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around.

lender.name: Trey (Papa) & Emma
lender.loan_because: I have a start-up company and I know how difficult it is to get started, and how wonderful it is to get some early help! I also want to teach my daughter (that is her photo) from an early age that helping others is our responsibility and our blessing. She enjoys helping me choose and having me read to her the updates.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small company that does biology research and training for other scientists in both universities and the biotech industry.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I don't have much to give, but for the people looking for loans on this website, my small amount makes a big difference to their lives. It's a great feeling.

lender.name: mole333
lender.loan_because: This is the best way I can make a difference internationally. I described my reasons behind helping Kiva and other groups here on the internet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist currently studying how diet, reproduction and aging are coordinated in an animal.

lender.name: Tessa
lender.loan_because: We almost collectively gave up on the developing countries. Kiva is a fantastic initiative. Micro-lending might be critized, it might not be the perfect option, but it is currently the best option to help the poor and to circumvent corrupt governments. I strongly believe that development comes from these simple, but highly effective initiatives Particularly this one, as it stimulates entrepreneurship, the basis of all development.
lender.occupational_info: I am the owner of a speakersbureau, The Next Speaker. My bureau represents speakers that talk about new media, new technology, and innovation and most of them are entrepreneurs. My filosophy is that most of the innovation in a country takes place in smaller companies that can go faster and have the freedom to try out new ideas. The Next Speaker mediates between those speakers and companies that would like to learn about the latest developments.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Running your own business is rewarding -- I am thrilled to help fund wonderful people through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional jazz pianist. (The picture is of me playing accordian -- I will add a piano picture soon).

lender.name: Heidi
lender.occupational_info: Circle of Ancestors reconnects people with their own ancestral traditions.

lender.name: Shakeel
lender.loan_because: A little capital, given directly to the person who can make the best use of it, seems to be a really efficient way to help others work their way out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Designing and building systems that remove pollution from the water and soil all around us.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: People in the U.S. are very lucky because we have many opportunities to be successful. I am very happy that Kiva has given me an opportunity to share my success with someone else who works hard and deserves opportunities like I have. I hope to encourage my friends and family to follow my example.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university library, helping students with research for their studies.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference for Kiva borrowers.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people, especially women, raise their quality of life by recognizing the abundance in their environments. 環境の豊かさに気付いて生活を向上できるように人、特に女性、を支援することを信じています。 Please check my blog: http://www.yutakasaguide.org
lender.occupational_info: By asking the right questions and giving support, I help my clients recognize their abundance and find ways to create ripples in the world by sharing that abundance, one person at a time.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I wish to represent the citizens of the US in a positive manner by helping others. There are many of us who wish for international peace. I support the individual - and Kiva gives me a way to do so.

lender.name: Dennis

lender.occupational_info: I defend jaywalkers in the court of law. Somehow, exercising your right to walk across the street in our supposedly free nation can earn you a citation from local law enforcement.

lender.name: leonie & nic wise
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped us out in times of need and we are continually looking to do the same for others
lender.occupational_info:
Nic is a really smart guy, who writes computer programs and applications. He's an independant contractor who works for companies in London & Denmark.
Leonie has been a project manager until recently. Now she's the operations manager for a recruitment consultancy in London, UK.

lender.name: Robin
lender.occupational_info: I work at a TV network.

lender.name: Dylan M Austin
lender.loan_because: A small effort in distributing the lavishness in which I effortlessly live
lender.occupational_info: I build things on the internet

lender.name: SmooveJ
lender.occupational_info: I make kiva go.

lender.name: whogivesashirt

lender.occupational_info: Second hand clothing sales.

lender.name: Austin Mayor

lender.occupational_info: Austin Mayor is a fictional character who blogs about politics, music, cartoons, peace, justice and other interests in Chicagoland Illinois.

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life and feel it is now my turn to aid others with a helping hand.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I have experienced first hand the transforming power of a simple act of kindness, and I want to share that with others who are determined to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I appear on stage, in films, television, and on the radio.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: it allows me to help make dreams come true.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves, their family, and their community.

lender.name: Melissa Faith

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: there is a need

lender.occupational_info: Accounting and business management

lender.name: Charlie

Currently I work in a regional office helping a group of branches with issues related to day to day operations.

lender.name: Fracture

lender.name: Matt Day

lender.name: logan huiskamp

lender.name: Sam Snyder

lender.name: jeffrey

lender.name: Helen

lender.name: Mary Jo
lender.loan_because: It's a small way that I can make a difference.

lender.name: Wayne

lender.name: Andrew Solmssen

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is the basis of freedom.

lender.name: Kevin Kelly

lender.loan_because: people should help each other.

lender.name: Flora Graham
lender.loan_because: being able to support yourself and your family is important for happiness, independence and freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles about science for newspapers and magazines.

lender.name: Alexander

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to better themselves.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of this social experiment. I believe that this is not charity, it\'s justice.
lender.occupational_info: I write software

lender.name: Dav
lender.loan_because: I <3 capitalism.
lender.occupational_info: I help create our technology.

lender.name: Colin

lender.name: matthew

lender.name: Laurie & Emerald
lender.loan_because: This is the biggest return I can get for the small amount I have to invest.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: I am a former Peace Corps Volunteer

lender.name: Susan and Eliana
lender.loan_because: The need is great, so I participate in a number of development charities. Kiva, by allowing us to pick individual recipients, puts a face on it for my elementary-school age daughter.

lender.name: Claudio Shikida
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of free markets to get people out of the poverty. Incentives matter. I hope the new entrepreneurs don\'t forget the social benefits of profit-seeking instead of the deleterious practice of rent-seeking.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I heard that there's big cash to be made in lending money. Now I just have to lie back and watch as the $$$ rolls in... With the economy the way it is, I'm already beating market!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a law student. In a few years I'll be evil, wait, I mean a lawyer, wait, I mean eviler.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: providing credit directly to enterpreneurial people is probably a good way to encourage economic development more generally.
lender.occupational_info: I don\'t have any ongoing work but do occasional consultancy on political matters. I am also working on a Master\'s thesis on Arabic literature.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I try to tell stories that people want to hear, so my clients can have their message heard.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to make a real impact on the world - and I get to brag to my friends that I am an international financier.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies build their web sites.

lender.name: Hunter
lender.loan_because: we are asked to share our blessings
lender.occupational_info: Help companies design and maintain computer programs to better their operations.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: it is a great, responsible way to assist people in their moment of need, no matter how long that moment is.
lender.occupational_info: I help with the design of building details, to make the buildings last longer and withstand the elements.

lender.name: Chelsa
lender.occupation: Marketing and Community Outreach Director @ Kiva
lender.loan_because: It is inspiring to feel connected from so far away and truly remarkable to hear of both the struggles & joys our world's entrepreneurs face everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I love what I do, so it's easy to work hard.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to bring hope.

lender.name: Mario & Kristin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance and blessings should be shared.

lender.name: Sarah Lewis
lender.loan_because: I believe that loans are an efficient, effective, and sustainable solution to poverty.

lender.occupational_info:
We research, write and edit text for companies and individuals who want well-written content for their marketing material, websites, sales letters, press releases and more.

When a company wants to send an advertising flyer to their customers, we write the text so that it well-received and increases sales. When that company wants to create a website, we make sure that it looks professional and is well-written.

In essence, we're writers for hire, and we commit a percentage of every dollar we earn in profit to Kiva.

That Kiva provides loans rather than donations is another major reason. I have \"reinvested\" the money from my first loans, and the fact that the same money can help more than once, also makes Kiva truly engaging.

And if that isn't enough, calling yourself a "Part Time International Financier" sounds rather cool down the pub. ;-)

Equipping someone that has everything they need to get where they want...except the funds to do so. In addition to helping someone financially, this goes beyond that. lender.occupational_info:
Alif’s years of experience in the Interactive space has led to a comprehensive knowledge of Internet technologies and business practices. Simply put, his desire is to utilize the new conversations the Internet presents to help others.
An entrepreneur at heart, he made a commitment two and half years ago to Conductor, Inc. (formerly knows as LinkExperts) and has every intention of seeing it through. He stands for trust, integrity, and a unique no nonsense approach to achieving goals.
Alif’s uncanny way of mentally compartmentalizing tasks at hand allows him to surpass milestones along the path to achieving his goals.
Alif posses a tenacious demeanor of completing tasks, then moves on to the next objective. Along this path, he enjoys sharing his experiences with everyone. His unique style of teaching, allows others to call upon their own apprehension in order to solve problems.
He is completely candid, stands true to what he believes in, promotes the causes he is passionate about, and always strives for the best.
Alif is the quintessential critical first hire for any organization that wishes to be successful.
